metadata.name: Yardimci (The Helper)
metadata.description:
**DESCRIPTION (EN)**  
- This song is dedicated to those who lost their lives and/or loved ones in the 2023 Turkey-Syria earthquakes.  
- A sage once said: "*Don't be in a hurry. Be sensitive. Start by creating a collaboration for now. It is not right to try to deliver all the aid through a single channel. Those who are truly in trouble will be identified over time. For now, the clamorers might make themselves more prominent; those who shout the loudest might be the ones who are less injured and more timid. Those who remain silent, however, are both harder and later to reach.*"  
- As the initial intense (and admirable, of course) interest in the disaster area slowly began to fade, I had a feeling that the "time" the sage spoke of had arrived, so I made "Yardimci (The Helper)" to do some small but impactful good.  
- All proceeds (including resale royalties) from the NFT of this song will go "directly" to **ankarelief.org**'s Ethereum address for earthquake donations.  
- I chose ankarelief.org based on my observations that  
   1. it is a secure, transparent and "sustainable" crypto fund built on a "multi-signature" basis;  
   2. there are competent and influential people (industry leaders) among these multi signers; and  
   3. they have provided adequate answers to important questions on their website's FAQ section.  
- You can verify that the $eth you paid for your NFT is being transferred to the publicly announced Anka Relief donation account by cross-checking the smart contract, the address list on ankarelief.org, and TXs on Etherscan.  
- Thank you for being another yardimci/helper.

**LYRICS (EN)**  
~~~  
  (Street Sounds)  
  ~~  
  (Chorus)(x2)  
  The Helper, don't touch my wound!  
  The beloved is gone.  
  Don’t look for her around.  
  The beloved is gone.  
  ~~  
  She left a crumpled note.  
  "Bye…" she wrote, tore my heart out.  
  Flood turned into a single tear, and flowed.  
  The Helper, don't touch my wound!  
  ~~  
  (Chorus)(x2)  
  The Helper, don't touch my wound!  
  The beloved is gone.  
  Don’t look for her around.  
  The beloved is gone.  
  ~~  
  Who knows where?  
  God not make her a stranger.  
  Ask Google once about her.  
  The Helper, don't touch my wound!  
  ~~  
  (Chorus)(x2)  
  The Helper, don't touch my wound!  
  The beloved is gone.  
  Don’t look for her around.  
  The beloved is gone.  
  ~~  
  (Street Sounds)  
~~~

----------------------------------------

**ACIKLAMA (TR)**  
- Bu sarki 2023 Turkiye-Suriye depremlerinde yasamini ve/veya sevdiklerini kaybedenlere adanmistir.  
- Bir bilge zamaninda soyle demisti: "*Acele etmeyin. Duyarli olun. Simdilik bir is birligi olusturmakla ise baslayin. Tum yardimi tek bir kanaldan ulastirmaya calismak dogru degil. Gercekten zorluk icinde olanlar zamanla tespit edilir. Simdilik yaygaracilar kendilerini daha cok one cikarabilir; cok bagiranlar belki de daha az yarali ve daha urkek olanlardir. Diger yandan sessiz kalanlar, hem daha zor hem de daha gec ulasilacak olanlardir.*"  
- Afet bolgesine yonelik bastaki yogun (ve elbette takdire deger) ilginin yavas yavas sonumlenmeye baslamasi, bende o bilgenin sozunu ettigi "zaman"in geldigine iliskin bir duygu uyandirdi; boylelikle kucuk de olsa etkili bir yarar saglamak icin "Yardimci (The Helper)"i yaptim.  
- NFT formundaki bu sarkinin tum gelirleri (tekrar satis royaltileri de dahil olmak uzere) "dogrudan" **ankarelief.org**'un deprem bagislari icin yayinladigi Ethereum adresine gidecek.  
- ankarelief.org'u secmemdeki motivasyon  
   1. "coklu-imza"  ilkesiyle olusturulmus guvenli, seffaf ve "surdurulebilir" bir kripto fonu olmasi;  
   2. bu coklu imzacilar arasinda, alanlarinda yetkin ve etkili insanlar (sektor liderleri) bulunmasi; ve  
   3. web sitelerinin SSS kisminda onemli sorulara yeterli yanitlar vermis olmalari  
  seklinde ozetleyebilecegim gozlemlerim.  
- NFT'niz icin odediginiz $eth'in, kamuoyuna duyurulmus Anka Relief bagis hesabina) aktariliyor oldugunu akilli sozlesmeyi, ankarelief.org'taki adres listesini ve Etherscan'deki islemleri capraz kontrolle dogrulayabilirsiniz.  
- Bir baska yardimci/helper oldugunuz icin sag olun.
